infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to the camera to scan study materials and take photos of notes.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to the microphone to record audio notes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to save and load study materials.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to save photos to your library.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your calendar to schedule study sessions.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app needs access to reminders to help you remember study tasks.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app needs access to contacts for sharing study materials.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs your location to provide location-based study features.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses motion data to track study activities.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This app uses speech recognition to help you study with voice commands.
infoPlist.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This app needs access to Apple Music for background study music.
